display_long_description:
**It’s time for your starring role in Deep Cuts – a genre bending blend of messy physics, rich storytelling, and highly detailed worlds. A new chapter in the Scythe Saga Universe from the horror masterminds behind Happy's Humble Burger Farm!**

Take on the role of Elise Weber, co-founder of film production studio Lights Camera Faction, as they embark on a blockbuster quest to save their best friend and creative partner, Malcolm Micheaux, by venturing through the duo’s expansive film catalog. Relive all of LCF’s iconic and cinematic moments as you gain superpowers, and face off against a maniacal group of deprecated and deadly cartoon characters – The Learning Lads.

[media]

# Physics Action! 
Kinetically driven and dynamically interactive melee and firearms combat with diverse weapon options inside highly responsive environments.

[media]

# Deep Lore and Environmental Storytelling
Uncover the rich backstory of LCF and their hidden secrets as you journey through beloved movie genres and tropes.

[media]

# Neurareel Film Experiences
Immerse yourself in real-time scenes within living movie sets, mixing life and art in ways previously unexplored. Dive into various film genres from 1980s Horror and Retrofuturistic Sci-fi to Spaghetti Western and Film Noir as you take on the roles of different protagonists.

[media]

# Time Manipulation Abilities
Harness cinematic augmentations, granting editing actions on the fly that make you the director. Use these abilities strategically to overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and enemy barrages.
